code:
# @param {Integer} n
# @param {Integer} k
# @return {Integer[]}
def circular_game_losers(n, k)
  # Initialize an array to track if a friend has received the ball.
  received_ball = Array.new(n, false)

  # Starting position.
  current_position = 0

  # Initialize a counter for turns.
  turn = 0

  while true
    # Calculate the next position.
    current_position = (current_position + k - 1) % n

    # If this friend has already received the ball, break the loop.
    break if received_ball[current_position]

    # Mark this friend as having received the ball.
    received_ball[current_position] = true

    # Increment turn.
    turn += 1

    # End the game if all friends have received the ball.
    break if turn == n
  end

  # Prepare the list of losers.
  losers = []
  received_ball.each_with_index do |received, index|
    losers << index + 1 unless received
  end

  losers
end
